Text: Dont download - unless you want to experience Britney played in reverse

All tracks on album are reversed.  Still lossless audio, but in reverse.  Solution:  Rip to .wav and reverse file with Cool Edit Pro (Adobe Audition).  Then recode to desired format.

Too much work for Britney Spears.
